original_text: After that, Jesus and his disciples arrived at Capernaum. Some men who received taxes for the temple went to talk to Peter. They asked him, ‘Does your teacher pay the tax for the temple?’
korean_text: 가버나움에 이르니 반 세겔 받는 자들이 베드로에게 나아와 이르되 너의 선생은 반 세겔을 내지 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus and his disciples arrived at Capernaum
Some men who received taxes for the temple went to talk to Peter
sentences.korean_translation: 성전 세금을 받던 몇 사람이 베드로에게 말하러 왔다

sentences.original_text: Does your teacher pay the tax for the temple?
